segments.text: I notice the details in this kitchen illustration.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: An adult woman faces away, drying dishes with care.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Her posture is relaxed, immersed in the simple chore.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The sink behind her overflows steadily from the faucet.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Water cascades down, pooling on the floor unchecked.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She's partially in the puddle, but shows no sign of awareness.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: On the counter, stacks of clean dishes wait patiently.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy uses a stool to access the upper cabinet.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It tilts precariously as he leans for the cookie jar.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Cookies tempt him, and he's taking full advantage.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl assists by holding out her hand below.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Their teamwork in mischief is almost admirable.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Through the divided window panes, a garden path appears.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Bushes line it neatly, offering a serene backdrop.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Inside, though, the scene teeters on the edge of chaos.
segments.speaker: PAR
